member.name: M:Forge.DatabaseManagement.SqlServer2008.MsSql2008Manager.EnsureDatabaseIntegrity(System.Int64,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},Forge.DatabaseManagement.SchemaFactoryModeEnum)
member.summary: Ensures the database integrity.
member.exception: MsSql2008 Manager has not been initialized.
Unable to connection information in NHibernate Descriptor settings.

Connection string is empty. or Connection string does not contains DATABASE nor DATA SOURCE definition. or Connection string does not contains PASSWORD definition. or Connection string does not contains information about the database name.

member.name: T:Forge.DatabaseManagement.SqlServer2008.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Forge.DatabaseManagement.SqlServer2008.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Forge.DatabaseManagement.SqlServer2008.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Forge.DatabaseManagement.SqlServer2008.Properties.Resources.AlterDatabaseCollation
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ALTER DATABASE [{0}] COLLATE {1}.

member.name: P:Forge.DatabaseManagement.SqlServer2008.Properties.Resources.CheckLogin
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT COUNT(*) FROM master.dbo.syslogins db WHERE db.loginname = @P0.

member.name: P:Forge.DatabaseManagement.SqlServer2008.Properties.Resources.CreateDatabase
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to CREATE DATABASE [{0}].

member.name: P:Forge.DatabaseManagement.SqlServer2008.Properties.Resources.CreateLogin
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to CREATE LOGIN {0} WITH PASSWORD = '{1}', CHECK_EXPIRATION = OFF, CHECK_POLICY = OFF.

member.name: P:Forge.DatabaseManagement.SqlServer2008.Properties.Resources.DatabaseCheck
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT COUNT(*) FROM master.dbo.sysdatabases db WHERE db.name = @P0.

member.name: P:Forge.DatabaseManagement.SqlServer2008.Properties.Resources.GetDatabaseCollation
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT DATABASEPROPERTYEX('{0}', 'Collation') SQLCollation.

member.name: P:Forge.DatabaseManagement.SqlServer2008.Properties.Resources.SetDatabaseOwner
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ALTER AUTHORIZATION ON DATABASE::{0} TO [{1}].
